dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.description: Here's a summary of your spiritual practice.

add.title: Add New Client
add.description: Enter the details for the new client.
add.success_toast_desc: The new client has been successfully added to your roster.
add.error_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.

reading.title: New AI Reading
reading.description: Generate a personalized tarot reading for a client.
reading.loadingMessage: The spirits are whispering... please wait.

toast.missingInfoDesc: Please select a client and draw cards first.
toast.failedDesc: The spirits are quiet right now. Please try again later.

services.title: Services
services.pageDescription: An overview of the tarot reading services you offer.

general.title: General Reading
general.description: A big-picture overview of the current energy. Suitable for clients without specific questions.

love.title: Love & Relationship Reading
love.description: Romantic relationships (partner, ex, potential). Love energy, loyalty, relationship future. Suitable for those dating, in LDRs, or in conflict.

career.title: Career & Business Reading
career.description: Career direction, job choices, business opportunities. Suitable for those considering resignation, interviews, or promotions.

finance.title: Finance Reading
finance.description: Financial energy, fortune opportunities, expenses, investments. Can be combined with actionable advice.

spiritual.title: Spiritual & Healing Reading
spiritual.description: Aura reading, karma, past life, inner energy. Suitable for those needing self-reflection or emotional healing.

yesNo.title: Yes or No Reading
yesNo.description: A direct answer to one specific question. Quick and simple, suitable for express services.

timeBased.title: Time-based Reading
timeBased.description: Weekly, monthly, or yearly energy forecast. Predictions for a specific period.

ppf.title: Past-Present-Future Reading
ppf.description: Highlights the past, current conditions, and future predictions.

soulmate.title: Soulmate / Twin Flame Reading
soulmate.description: Soul connections, spiritual relationships, destined partners.

chakra.title: Chakra or Energy Reading
chakra.description: Assesses the balance of the body's energy or chakras.

settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Manage your business specializations, durations, and payment methods.

specializations.title: Your Service Specializations
specializations.description: Manage the tarot reading services you offer to clients.

durations.title: Appointment Durations
durations.description: Set the available time slots for your readings.

payment.title: Payment Methods
payment.description: Configure the payment options available to your clients.
